headline: Is Hormel (HRL) Quietly Redefining Its Brand With New Protein Skillet Meals?
summary: In early January 2026, Hormel Foods Corporation announced that its HORMEL® MARY KITCHEN® Hash brand has added two skillet products, Chorizo Skillet and Southwest Style Skillet, now available at select retailers nationwide, featuring hearty protein, bold flavors, and versatility for quick, comfort-focused meals. This expansion into ready-to-cook skillets highlights Hormel’s push further into convenient, protein-rich meal solutions that can serve as either main dishes or flexible recipe...

headline: Has Hormel Foods (HRL) Share Price Slump Created A Valuation Opportunity?
summary: If you are wondering whether Hormel Foods at around US$22.85 is starting to look like value, you are not alone. Many investors are asking the same question. The stock has recently seen a 4.7% decline over 7 days, a 6.1% decline over 30 days, and is down 2.3% year to date and 21.0% over the past year, with a 44.7% decline over 3 years and 40.2% over 5 years. This has reshaped how some investors may be thinking about its risk and potential. Recent news around Hormel Foods has focused on its...

headline: A Look At Hormel Foods (HRL) Valuation After New Mary Kitchen Skillet Meal Launches
summary: Hormel Foods (HRL) is drawing fresh attention after expanding its MARY KITCHEN brand with two skillet meal products, raising questions about what this convenience focused push could mean for the stock. See our latest analysis for Hormel Foods. The new MARY KITCHEN launches arrive at a time when momentum in Hormel Foods’ share price has been soft, with a 30 day share price return of 6.12% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 20.99%, hinting that investors are still cautious about...
